publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1681 Sarah Boyack: Corporate Responsibility—That the Parliament notes the significant impact that businesses and corporations can have on communities and the environment in which they operate and supports efforts aimed at improving the accountability of companies for their actions.
S2M-1681 Corporate Responsibility (lodged on 13 September 2004) Karen Gillon*, Irene Oldfather*, Mark Ballard*, Bill Butler*, Trish Godman*, Eleanor Scott*, Cathie Craigie*

S2M-1681 Corporate Responsibility (lodged on 13 September 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Chris Ballance*, Jackie Baillie*, Robert Brown*, Margaret Jamieson*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Christine May*, Karen Whitefield*, Helen Eadie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1681 Corporate Responsibility (lodged on 13 September 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Maureen Macmillan*, Dr Jean Turner*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-1681 Sarah Boyack: Corporate Responsibility—That the Parliament notes the significant impact that businesses and corporations can have on communities and the environment in which they operate and supports efforts aimed at improving the accountability of companies for their actions. Supported by: Karen Gillon, Irene Oldfather, Mark Ballard, Bill Butler, Trish Godman, Eleanor Scott, Cathie Craigie, Mr Jamie Stone, Richard Lochhead, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Chris Ballance, Jackie Baillie, Robert Brown, Margaret Jamieson, Marilyn Livingstone, Christine May, Karen Whitefield, Helen Eadie, Tommy Sheridan, Nora Radcliffe, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Jean Turner, Marlyn Glen, Robin Harper*
